data.blog: Have you been thinking about trying out AI assistant tools for your content? However, one question that keeps popping up in your head is “Are AI Content Writing Tools Worth Trying out? And Should I invest my money in an AI writing Software?” More than 35% of businesses around the globe are using AI in some form and writing is included in that too. However, writing is a creative process and the idea that a machine can write content can be somewhat difficult to digest.
